title: Docker Context Management
description: Manage Docker contexts for local and remote engines.

cards.prompt: Using Docker context commands, list Docker contexts.
cards.explanation: Shows available contexts and current active context.

cards.prompt: Using Docker context commands, show the currently active Docker context.
Using Docker context commands, inspect details of context remote-prod.
cards.explanation: Inspect includes endpoint and TLS settings.

cards.prompt: Using Docker context commands, create context remote-prod using SSH endpoint ssh://ubuntu@prod-host.
cards.explanation: Creates context pointing at remote engine via SSH.

cards.prompt: Using Docker context commands, switch to Docker context remote-prod.
cards.explanation: Subsequent docker commands target this context.

cards.prompt: Using Docker context commands, export context remote-prod to file remote-prod.dockercontext.
Using Docker context commands, import context remote-prod from file remote-prod.dockercontext.
cards.explanation: Imports context file on another machine.

cards.prompt: Using Docker context commands, remove context remote-prod.
